entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Guysborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tracadie 12:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
Temperature: -2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -5.4°C
Wind: NNE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. High zero. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow in the morning. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
